question_text: Which scenario requires a power supply with active PFC (Power Factor Correction)?
answer_options: When connected to international 230V mains without a manual voltage switch
When powering a system with multiple GPUs
When using an uninterruptible power supply (UPS)
correct_answer: When connected to international 230V mains without a manual voltage switch
explanation: Active PFC allows the PSU to automatically adapt to varying AC voltages without needing a manual switch, making it suitable for worldwide use.
